entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late this evening then northeast 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
